title: Tryndamere/Smite bug
body: Smite can kill Trynd through his ult. This is fucked up. Fix pls.

replies.body: %%%% YES FINALLY SOME DAMN COUNTERPLAY, GET REKT TRYHARDaMERE

Went into a blind pick game as Yi with smite, enemy Tryn said he will get me banned just because I have smite and can insta kill him. Still waiting for it.

Buy a GA and use your ult after you die to the smite or get a Zilean support.

Not gonna play Trondamere till this is fixed.

Oh wait... i haven't played him in forever.
I main trynd, I CANT PLAY ANYONE ELSE LOL
